casebody.data:
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent
v.
Beverly Kaye STEFFEY, Petitioner Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Respondent
v.
Beverly Kaye Steffey, Petitioner Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Respondent
v.
Beverly Kaye Steffey, Petitioner No. 376 WAL 2018
No. 377 WAL 2018
No. 378 WAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. February 21, 2019

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 21st day of February, 2019, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The issue, as stated by petitioner, is:

Whether, in a case of first impression after and in light of this Court's decision in Commonwealth v. Veon, [ 637 Pa. 442 ] 150 A.3d 435 (Pa.2016), the Superior Court erred in holding that a sentence to pay restitution to a nonprofit corporation may be ordered?
